review: Terrible connection capabilities. Can stream Netflix fine from my computer, but when I try and stream from the Fire TV Stick, it constantly has to load though out the show. Pretty disappointing. Also there is some quality loss due to the bad connectivity of the wireless device inside the stick.

review: I loved the fire stick from the moment I took it out of the box. It could not possibly have been any easier to install or use. I absolutely love the program selection as well as the searchability. I purchased a Roku for my father in law and set it up for him and this was far easier. Don't get me wrong, I liked the Roku, but I'm more impressed with the Amazon fire stick.
author: Kasie DeLap
